duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide executive level administrative support to the Office Director and senior administrative assistant.
Manage bookkeeping tasks, including creating financial spreadsheets, maintaining project files, and managing vendors.
Handle real estate and property management administrative tasks.
Cover for and perform the responsibilities of the Senior Administrative Assistant when they are out of the office.
Create and maintain detailed spreadsheets, reports, and documentation.
Assist with research and special projects as needed.
Draft correspondence, documents, and reports with attention to detail and quality.
Respond to inquiries made to CEO's office and make phone calls as required.
Maintain subscription system, renewing and/or canceling as needed.
Perform clerical duties such as filing, archiving, faxing, copying, scanning, shipping, and running errands.
Maintain and order supplies, including getting lunch, coffee, and other office duties.
Arrange for various errands done by other staff.
